works.description:
Convonix Inc. is the owner of the domain www.convonix.com and the text and artwork appearing on it. 

Using the search query "is the art of placing your website in the first few pages of a search engine for a strategically defined set of keywords. Search engine optimization (SEO) leads to an increase in targeted traffic" we found pages that had copied chunks of content from our main page. 

Here's the search query URL -
http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&safe=off&rls=GGLJ%2CGGLJ%3A2006-26%2CGGLJ%3Aen-GB&q=%22is+the+art+of+placing+your+website+in+the+first+few+pages+of+a+search+engine+for+a+strategically+defined+set+of+keywords.+Search+engine+optimization+%28SEO%29+leads+to+an+increase+in+targeted+traffic+%22

The text "Web 2.0 has ushered in a new era in the still nascent world of internet marketing. Studies show that the advent of blogs, social media platforms, social bookmarking sites and other web 2.0 initiatives has resulted in over 44% of internet users becoming content creators. This combined with the increasing reach of search engines has resulted in an increase in exposure to any content that is created online." has also been copied allegedly on a few websites.

The text "customized to fit your requirements keeping in perspective long term business goals. We work hard to maximize your return on investment in internet marketing and search engine optimization.  Our Search engine optimization methodology includes" has been copied on websites without our permission. 
	
Here's the search query URL -

http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&source=hp&biw=&bih=&q=customized+to+fit+your+requirements+keeping+in+perspective+long+term+business+goals.+We+work+hard+to+maximize+your+return+on+investment+in+internet+marketing+and+search+engine+optimization.++Our+Search+engine+optimization+methodology+includes%3A&btnG=Google+Search&pws=0

Moreover, few websites have copied almost 50 percent of the content that exists on the URL mentioned under.

The text "Unlike SEO, search engines charge for every visitor that they send through their pay per click programs. Hence, this form of advertising works out more expensive than organic search engine optimization. However, through programs like Google Adsense, a lot of websites now display relevant PPC ads. This means that PPC advertising can result in a lot of targeted traffic and potential customers." has been copied allegedly on the websites mentioned under. 

The search query URL -

http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=Unlike+SEO%2C+search+engines+charge+for+every+visitor+that+they+send+through+their+pay+per+click+programs.+Hence%2C+this+form+of+advertising+works+out+more+expensive+than+organic+search+engine+optimization.+However%2C+through+programs+like+Google+Adsense%2C+a+lot+of+websites+now+display+relevant+PPC+ads.+This+means+that+PPC+advertising+can+result+in+a+lot+of+targeted+traffic+and+potential+customers.+&oq=Unlike+SEO%2C+search+engines+charge+for+every+visitor+that+they+send+through+their+pay+per+click+programs.+Hence%2C+this+form+of+advertising+works+out+more+expensive+than+organic+search+engine+optimization.+However%2C+through+programs+like+Google+Adsense%2C+a+lot+of+websites+now+display+relevant+PPC+ads.+This+means+that+PPC+advertising+can+result+in+a+lot+of+targeted+traffic+and+potential+customers.+&aq=f&aqi=&aql=&gs_sm=s&gs_upl=516733l516733l0l1l1l0l0l0l0l0l0ll0

Another search query for the text "Pay per click advertising is a part of paid search marketing. Under the PPC form of advertising, advertisers are required to bid for advertisement spots on search engines, which charge them for every click on the advertisement. In plain vanilla terms, the highest bidder for a particular keyword gets the highest spot" results into few more URLs that copied content from this page.

The text "Search engine marketing is essentially a term to define the process of providing visibility to a website through the search engine result pages (SERPS)." has been copied allegedly. Moreover, few websites have copied entire contentfrom this URLs. 

The search query URL's highlighting a few websites mentioned under is below -

http://www.google.com/search?q=Search+engine+marketing+is+essentially+a+term+to+define+the+process+of+providing+visibility+to+a+website+through+the+search+engine+result+pages+(SERPS).&hl=en&prmd=ivns&ei=O2EITvfCIMbtrQfsp5iqDA&start=10&sa=N&biw=1280&bih=655

The text "With social networks experiencing colossal amounts of traffic each day, there's a huge untapped marketing potential within such networks. A carefully planned SMO campaign, targeting relevant audience, could help your business get the extra boost it needs." has been allegedly copied on the websites mentioned under. Few websites have copied the entire content that is present on our page.
